sql-descriptor.sql: CREATE TABLE CATBTERM( TERM_CORP_CODE VARCHAR(4), TERM_STND_GUBN CHAR(1), TERM_STND_DEGR VARCHAR(10), TERM_MATL_SEQ0 NUMBER(5, 0), TERM_MATL_GUBN VARCHAR(8), TERM_TYPE_CODE VARCHAR(8), TERM_TERM_GRP1 VARCHAR(8), TERM_SIZE_MIN0 NUMBER(10, 2), TERM_SIZE_MAX0 NUMBER(10, 2), TERM_PLAT_CODE VARCHAR(8), TERM_TINP_YN VARCHAR(8), TERM_MATL_NAME VARCHAR(50), TERM_MATL_PRIC NUMBER(14, 6), TERM_MATL_UNIT VARCHAR(8), TERM_APPL_GUBN CHAR(1), TERM_REMK VARCHAR(200), TERM_UPDT_CMAN VARCHAR(8), TERM_UPDT_DATE VARCHAR(8), TERM_INIT_CMAN VARCHAR(8), TERM_INIT_DATE VARCHAR(8), CONSTRAINT CATBTERM_PK PRIMARY KEY ( TERM_CORP_CODE, TERM_STND_GUBN, TERM_STND_DEGR, TERM_MATL_SEQ0, TERM_MATL_GUBN ) )
